# E-Commerce Platform - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Multi-language, SEO-optimized, performance-focused e-commerce platform using Next.js 14+ with App Router.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- TailwindCSS
- next-intl (multi-language TR/EN)
- Redux Toolkit (state management)
- Fake Store API

## Project Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [ ] Scaffold Next.js project structure
- [ ] Configure TypeScript and TailwindCSS
- [ ] Setup next-intl for multi-language support
- [ ] Setup Redux Toolkit for state management
- [ ] Create project folder structure and components
- [ ] Install dependencies and verify setup
- [ ] Implement API integration with Fake Store API
- [ ] Build pages (Home, Products, Product Detail, Cart)
- [ ] Implement SEO optimization (ISR/SSG)
- [ ] Add performance optimizations
- [ ] Test and deploy

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow component-based architecture
- Implement responsive design with TailwindCSS
- Optimize images with next/image
- Use ISR/SSG for performance
- Write clean, modular code
- Make meaningful commits
